description:
Akaiito is new, but rapidly growing project of platform, which will give an opportunity to use crypto currency in every day life! Akaiito will be P2P platform using C2C business strategy,  where crypto holders will be able to spend their crypto and get products/services for that.
Akaiito will include 4 categories:
1. Online Market – users will sell and buy goods (user to user system)
2. Rent – users will lease and rent cars and apartments (user to user system)
3. Services – users will offer and use services/jobs (user to user system)
4. Online Map – in the city of user location on the map will be shown locations of all places, where is possible to pay with cryptocurrency
Platform will function on blockchain system. Smart contract will be the base for all deals. Currency of transactions will be AIC token (other cryptocurrencies can be used as well, they will be automatically transferred to AIC token).
More deep dive information You can find on: https://akaiito.io/ .
name: Akaiito
